level.heading: Statement of termination.
level.text: A dissolved limited partnership that has completed winding up may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of termination that states:
The name of the limited partnership;
The date of filing of its initial certificate of limited partnership; and
Any other information as determined by the general partners filing the statement or by a person appointed pursuant to ยง 29-708.03(c) or (d).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 203 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
